String.string: I would do anything to avenge my husband's death. Please...
Eliminate ksharan guards in the Brotherhood Quarters of the Necromancer Tomb. [You must select Necromancer Tomb (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:233#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]
Bring vindictive soul stones to Vandrea at the Sanguine Hideout in the Citadel of Torment.
